name: SII_IFCS_HART1
action: [IF]([EQ](<*VALUE(Is HART in C300 Controller?)*>,Yes)){<*ASSIGNVALUE(SII I/F Configuration Settings-HART1:0)*>}{<*ASSIGNVALUE(SII I/F Configuration Settings-HART1:<* Eval((3 * <*VALUE(Number of HART Interface Types)*>)+ (0.33 *<*VALUE(Number of HART Devices)*>) ) *>)*>}[ENDIF]
description:
SII I/F Configuration Settings-HART1

Calculated Hrs = IF(htc="Yes",0,htt*3 + ht*0.33)
